thread.title: Life | Watch: Stormchasers fly straight into the eye of Hurricane Patricia
thread.title_full: Life | Watch: Stormchasers fly straight into the eye of Hurricane Patricia - entertainment.ie

author: entertainment.ie
title: Life | Watch: Stormchasers fly straight into the eye of Hurricane Patricia
text:
The first few seconds of this video don't look like very much. Filmed from a phone (it looks like), it just seems to be some shaky footage of a plane flying through a bunch of clouds.
But knowing the context and what happens about 85 seconds or so in is pretty eery.
The brave pilots hit the eye of the storm and a strange silence.
The chasers are there because they want to gather information on Patricia so they can predict where the hurricane will strike next. Hats off to them.
These pictures of Hurricane Patricia are mind blowing pic.twitter.com/4THvI0Xcv7
â€” Barry Allen (@WethSilkosz) October 26, 2015
